intro: Psychrogeton brachyspermus, commonly known as the narrow-seed psychrogeton, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of South America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
